title: Bug 103963: No error message displayed when there is no data for series
description: When there is no data for a series, the system should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
OB: When there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a chart and define the data.
2. Select a column that does not have any data.
3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
